CustomField.formula: IF(Name ='McDowells Whiskey', IMAGE('https://na1.salesforce.com/resource/1328611913000/mcdowell', '') , IF(Name ='White Mischief Vodka', IMAGE('https://na1.salesforce.com/resource/1328612928000/whitemischief', '') , IF(Name ='Black Dog Whiskey', IMAGE('https://na1.salesforce.com/resource/1328615503000/blackdog', '') , IF(Name ='McDowells Rum', IMAGE('https://na1.salesforce.com/resource/1328617246000/mcdowellrum',''), IF(Name='Vladivar Vodka', IMAGE('https://na1.salesforce.com/resource/1328617577000/vladivar', ''), IF(Name='Wine', IMAGE('https://na1.salesforce.com/resource/1328618463000/Wine',''), IF(Name ='Bagpiper Whiskey', IMAGE('https://na1.salesforce.com/resource/1328618653000/bagpiper', ''), IF(Name ='Royal Challenge Whiskey', IMAGE('https://na1.salesforce.com/resource/1328619084000/royalchallenge', ''), IF(Name ='Signature Whiskey', IMAGE('https://na1.salesforce.com/resource/1328619291000/signaturewhis', ''), IF(Name ='Romanov Vodka', IMAGE('https://na1.salesforce.com/resource/1328626355000/romanov', ''), IF(Name ='Antiquity', IMAGE('https://na1.salesforce.com/resource/1328627773000/Antiquity', ''), '') ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
